description: This file defines a UI component called 'NoteCard' using the LightningJS framework. It renders a visual card with note details, including title, summary, date, and a delete button, along with methods for handling interactions and formatting date.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A LightningJS UI component for displaying a note with title, summary, date, and delete button, including interaction methods.

methods.name: noteSummary
methods.description: Computed property returning the note's summary or a default message if undefined.

methods.name: noteDate
methods.description: Computed property formatting the note's creation date.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click/tap event to emit a 'select' event with the note.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Handles delete event to emit a 'delete' event with the note.

methods.name: formatDate
methods.description: Formats a timestamp into a locale-aware string.
